Text: Anton Newcombe of The Brian Jonestown Massacre gives much of his music away for free on the official BJM website, so why put the same stuff up here?  Show your support by hitting his website and getting it there, and if you can, make a donation [to "The Committee to Keep Music Evil"]-- the band is fantastic and deserves your support.  If you can't, the music is still free and better than most of what's out there right now....
